GisIGeometry Class Reference

#include <IGeometry.h>

Inherits GisIDisposable.

Inherited by GisICurveAbstract, GisIGeometricAggregateAbstract, GisIPoint, and GisISurfaceAbstract.

Inheritance diagram for GisIGeometry:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

The GisIGeometry class defines the properties and methods common to all geometric types. GisIGeometry is an abstract type.

Definition at line 35 of file IGeometry.h.
